item.title: Testing Code Hilighting
item.description: testing ruby def foo puts 'foo' end testing python for nice in this: print "how interesting" testing latex \[ \sum_{n=1}^\infty \frac{1}{n} \text{ is divergent, but } \lim_{n \to \infty} \sum_{i=1}^n \frac{1}{i} -\ln n \text{exists.} \]
